definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Listening to the teacher worried of inquiry, leap or my sit at the same table told her reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 聽着閆老師着急的詢問，還是我的同桌告訴了她原委。

sentences.english: His classmates are also very like her, everyone called her "small leap teacher".
sentences.chinese: 班裏的同學也都很喜歡她，大家都叫她“小閆老師”。

definition: surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
